name: Maze Slapper 2.0
description:
Playing is easy! Unzip the attached file, and locate the executable labelled as My_Project2. That's it!

Welcome to Maze Slapper, the most literally named and most exciting form of tag to date! This is a 1v1 multiplayer mini-game. 

Maze Slapper 2.0 supports controllers (either single keyboard, single controller, or two controllers), has a host of expanded features, and has been snazzied up a bit. That's right, it's pretty now!
